Reviews.Title: “Fantastic serviced apartments and staff all 5 star”
Reviews.Author: Kir2510
Reviews.Content: hotel serviced apartments modern equipped amenities required stay staying bedroom compact especially baby suitable stay larger available bathroom space staff forest wangz fantastic fantastic beyond help feel comfortable home home definitely staying recommend found location acceptable situation daily shuttle bus available hotel close mrt supermarket

Reviews.Title: “Very very Nice!”
Reviews.Author: IsabellaSwan22
Reviews.Content: friendly courteous staff nice clean comfortable lockers cabinets lot space store ironing board iron closet hair dryer lacking convenient kitchen co eat outside cook self location 5 min mrt recommended pool private corridor people pass pool maybe covered bit privacy

Reviews.Title: “The best possible start to life in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: SS_Finland
Reviews.Content: relocated singapore february 2012 looking temporary stay permanent chose forest stay cook fresh meals bit space children arranged staff airport pickup prompt arrived service personal day 1 home clean bright spacious kitchen equipped malls novena mrt walking distance thank staff stay memorable

Reviews.Title: “exceptional service in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Myra23
Reviews.Content: weve staying apartment 12th december 2011 blown service mention cleanliness safe quiet neighborhood walk mrt shopping malls five minutewalk bus stops satisfying breakfast kitchenette laundry facility lorna omar asha gideon staff whos names missed mention thank husband feel home

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: JoaoMMC
Reviews.Content: moved singapore 1 month ago decided book forest wangz accommodation finding own choice apartments excellent sense treated day 1 hotel stylish hotels singapore service impeccable close amenities 10 minutes walk mrt subway malls stay

Reviews.Title: “A very nice place to stay in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: PiccadillyLondon
Reviews.Content: serviced apartments refreshing alternative usual wednesday singapore type hotels staying week home home offering comforts expects classy hotel friendly professional welcoming staff lots attention details highly recommend staying look forward returning soon thank
